ygData.subject: idempotent != safe
ygData.msgSnippet: Just wanted to point that out, because a bunch of recent messages seemed to be confusing the two. Safety is what s important in the discussions about using GET

Subject: idempotent != safe
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=7519858; y=4vcVf5XlQhEEOMuaj9M4pbk8tBOqLU2UQaRzV3DIUl_oyweQeW6L
X-Yahoo-Profile: gonga_thrash

Just wanted to point that out, because a bunch of recent messages
seemed to be confusing the two.

Safety is what's important in the discussions about using GET to make
state changes.  All safe operations are also idempotent, but not all
idempotent operations are safe (PUT, DELETE).

Mark.
